root.name: Samurai Shodown Anthology
root.description: Samurai Shodown Anthology is a compilation of all 2D Samurai Shodown games excluding Samurai Shodown V Special and all of the 3D Samurai Shodown games in the series.List of GamesSamurai ShodownSamurai Shodown IISamurai Shodown III: Blades of BloodSamurai Shodown IV: Amakusa's RevengeSamurai Shodown VSamurai Shodown VI aka Samurai Spirits Tenkaichi Kenkakuden
